entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Remove Unused Parameter" Refactoring #67229
  • Suggest simplifying generic attribute names #67222
  • Access find and access "referenced project" Compilations and AdditionalDocuments in ServiceHub.RoslynCodeAnalysisService #67219
  • Expose project ID on compilations in ServiceHub.RoslynCodeAnalysisService.exe #67218
  • InvalidOperationException in C# extract method refactoring #67217
  • Provide access to ApplicationDefinition project item from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Project #67215
  • Source code generator compiles with 0 erros, but I get "This generator is not generating files" #67214
  • Use of possibly unassigned field '_dummyPrimitive' (with sharplab) #67212
  • Roslyn 4.5 does not enable DiagnosticAnalyzers via the ruleset file anymore #67211
  • Compiler fails to detect a constructed `file` type. #67208
    17.6

Closed

  • The IDE locks files generated by source generators causing command line build to fail #50699
    17.5
  • Source generated documents should be opened in the real workspace instead of Miscellaneous files #50676
    17.5
  • Word selection malfunctions in invalid suffixed numeric literals #50380
    Backlog
  • Inline Parameter hints in multiple opened documents appear and disappear at different times #50174
  • Go to Implementation should show containing type for nested types #47447
    Backlog
  • Tool or fixer to convert POCO-style class to record #49682
    Backlog
  • Error List window doesn't show anything #49480
    Backlog
  • The reference and the reference count refers to the method name and not the method of the object #49288
    Backlog
  • Test plan for "using aliases for any types" #56323
    C# 12.0
  • Add tests for Error list build/intellisense diagnostic components #47758
    Backlog
  • Find All References returns sometimes returns zero results #47577
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Update 'make field readonly' to understand a special strict behaviour around generic assignment. #67227
    Area-IDE
  • Infra fixes #67223
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove 'ID' argument from WorkItem. (IDE only) #67210
    Area-IDE
  • Have AsyncLazy always cache values #67207
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Include containing type for nested types when showing goto-impl results #67224
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use Content for non-TFM specific items #67206
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Walk green tree in SyntaxFacts.HasYieldOperations to avoid excessive allocations in reported trace #67221
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • How to troubleshoot a build-time regression #67161
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Record completion of "alias any type" feature #67225
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Make 'ID' optional in a WorkItem attribute #67216
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/UsingAliasesTypes #67226
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge features/UsingAliasesTypes to main #67205
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Bind extension declarations #67126
    Area-Compilers
  • Warn when taking address of local or parameter in async method #66915
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow 'convert to interpolated string' to work in any API, instead of just a whitelisted set. #67135
    Area-IDE
  • Initial binding and lowering of collection literals with single-valued elements #67025
  • Add 'name' to option group #67136
    Area-IDE
  • Primary Constructors - Don't report unused parameters #67167
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Revert "Remove unused TS brace completion code"" #66781
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Enforce proper shadowing for locals and parameters in EE #67189
    Area-Compilers
  • Reduce allocations based on light bulb experimentation #67203
    Area-Compilers
  • Automatically visit lambdas without conversion in nullable walker #66637
    Area-Compilers
